------------------------------------------------------------------------

I work on [projects](https://personalscience.com) that make it easy for normal people to understand their microbiome test results. If you've tested yourself with Viome, DayTwo, Zoe, Thryve, Psomagen, uBiome or others, please [contact me](mailto:richardsprague+microbe@gmail.com) and I'll be happy to help you.

Browse or download [Personal Science Guide to the Microbiome](https://psm.personalscience.com/), my free 300+ page eBook of pretty much everything I know about the microbiome.
